articles.author: Megan Durisin
articles.title: Pfizer and Moderna increase price of Covid vaccines in latest EU deal - Independent.ie
articles.description: Pfizer and Moderna have increased the prices of their Covid-19 vaccines in the latest supply contracts with the European Union, the Financial Times has reported.
articles.content:
Pfizer and Moderna have increased the prices of their Covid-19 vaccines in the latest supply contracts with the European Union, the Financial Times has reported.
